Introduction to Net::SSLeay
Net::SSLeay is a PERL extension for using OpenSSL.

sect3.title: Installation of Net::SSLeay
sect3.para:
This module uses a variant of the standard build and installation instructions:
yes '' | perl Makefile.PL && make && make test
Now, as the root user:
make install

sect3.title: Command Explanations
sect3.para: yes '': Perl will ask if you wish to run external tests, which will fail if you do not have network connectivity. The default is 'n', specifying this allows you to script the build.
